title: L F people for 5 man flex games at night
body:
hey guys/girls 

i have been playing with a group of people for bout a month now but we keep getting 3 to for 4 people online or some have to get up for work and stuff early the next morning so we get stuck with 4, so im looking for people looking to play game at bout 9 30 on. 
we use discord and lol chat but mostly discord

thanks for looking at this and keen send an invite 

cheers

replies.body: I'd be keen to join, currently gold 3 in solo que. Happy to play any position (prefer adc or top). Add me on league if you still need players.

what role are you missing? and are you looking to win or just have fun?

i'm willing to join, but i'm afraid i won't be as much help if you're asking for wins

not so much looking for roles just players right now 

i have added you and detendu as well
I'm keen as a jelly bean to play :) Detendu#2622 is my discord
